references.paper_title: SDXL: Improving latent diffusion models for high-resolution image synthesis
references.reason: SDXL is the foundation model upon which FreeScale builds, extending its capabilities to even higher resolutions.

references.paper_title: VideoCrafter2: Overcoming data limitations for high-quality video diffusion models
references.reason: VideoCrafter2 serves as the core video generation model that FreeScale enhances for higher-resolution video synthesis.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This work introduces Latent Diffusion Models (LDMs), a key architecture that underpins both SDXL and FreeScale.

references.paper_title: Diffusion models beat GANs on image synthesis
references.reason: This work establishes diffusion models as powerful generative models, exceeding GANs in image quality, and laying the groundwork for subsequent advancements like SDXL and FreeScale.

references.paper_title: ScaleCrafter: Tuning-free higher-resolution visual generation with diffusion models
references.reason: ScaleCrafter is a significant prior work in tuning-free resolution enhancement for diffusion models, which FreeScale improves upon by addressing the issue of repetitive patterns and artifacts.
